  • Constructor Details

    • WebhookRequest

      public WebhookRequest(@NonNull @NonNull String callback, @NonNull @NonNull String mode, @NonNull @NonNull TwitchWebhookTopic topic, Integer leaseSeconds, String secret)
      Deprecated.

    • WebhookRequest

      public WebhookRequest(@NonNull @NonNull String callback, @NonNull @NonNull String mode, @NonNull @NonNull String topic, Integer leaseSeconds, String secret)
      Deprecated.
      Creates a new WebhookRequest instance.
      Parameters:
      callback - Callback URL
      mode - Either "subscribe" or "unsubscribe"
      topic - Topic URL Can be generated by TwitchWebhookTopic.toString()
      leaseSeconds - Lease time in seconds. Default is 0, which is only useful for testing.
      secret - Secret used to sign notification payloads. The X-Hub-Signature header is generated by sha256(secret, notification_bytes). We strongly encourage you to use this, so your application can verify that notifications are genuine.

    • getSecret

      public String getSecret()
      Deprecated.
      Secret used to sign notification payloads. The X-Hub-Signature header is generated by sha256(secret, notification_bytes). We strongly encourage you to use this, so your application can verify that notifications are genuine.
